entries.title: Ths Shifting Landscape of Design
entries.description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of design, we find ourselves at the precipice of a profound transformation. This shift prompts us to reevaluate the essence of our role, transitioning from mere designers to advocates for both users and the integrity of the design process.

entries.title: The Importance of Baselines
entries.description: Baselines provide a stable and known starting point for comparison during software development and testing. By comparing changes or new versions against the baseline, discrepancies, bugs, or regressions can be easily identified, ensuring software quality and reliability throughout its development life cycle.
